Search BED files by text

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_bed_text_search.Rd

Returns all available results scored.

bb_bed_text_search(bedbase, query, limit = 10, offset = 0)

Arguments

bedbase

API object of BEDbase created from BEDbase()

query

character(1) keywords to search

limit

integer(1) (default 10) maximum number of results

offset

integer(1) (default 0) page offset of results

Value

tibble(1) of results

Examples

bedbase <- BEDbase()
#> 20727 BED files available.
bb_bed_text_search(bedbase, "hg38")
#> # A tibble: 10 × 43
#>    id                   payload.species_name payload.species_id payload.genotype
